p: Taken together, result from the solubility study showed that the highest drug solubility and better aqueous dispersibility was exhibited by F1-SNEDDS among all formulations, and this F1-SNEDDS system has been chosen for the inÂ vivo animal studies and anti-diabetic studies. It was also confirmed that both SN and DN prefer the SNEDDS which contained more medium chain polar glycerides and water-soluble surfactant.
